title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 246.2 - Containers
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 246.2 - Containers

State Regulations

Articles of food placed in a refrigerated warehouse and/or
locker plant shall be securely packed, wrapped or enclosed in suitable boxes, cartons, crates or other packages, unless the articles are of a character
impracticable to pack in containers, in which event they may be stored in
bulk. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
246.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
